long_description: Offering supportive stretch for your runs in chilly weather, the women's Filament tights from Nike combine moisture-wicking performance fabric with a great range of motion. Quick drying Dri-FIT(R) fabric delivers high-tech moisture wicking to keep you cool, and it feels soft and comfortable against your skin; fabric is mostly recycled. Fabric offers a UPF 50+ rating to help protect skin from UV light. Elastic waistband with a drawcord waist ensures a comfortable fit. Zippered rear pocket stores keys, credit card or media player. Gusseted inseam enhances freedom of motion. The women's Nike Filament tights offer a close-to-skin fit.
short_description: Offering supportive stretch for your runs in chilly weather, the women's Filament tights from Nike combine moisture-wicking performance fabric with a great range of motion.
